title: 墨镜.肖像 No.0221
content:
We are the Human Rights Group of Chinese International School in Hong Kong. We support Chen Guangcheng and demand his release from illegal house arrest.  His family– who have never been convicted of any crime– deserve to lead a normal life.  His daughter deserves the right to go to school. Chen has the right to resume his work in defense of human rights.  The Chinese government must ensure that Chen and all human rights defenders in China are allowed to carry out their work without fear of persecution or retribution.  要有光 要有诚!

我们是香港汉基国际学校的人权组。我们支持陈光诚，并强烈要求他从非法软禁中被释放。他的家人－其从未被定罪－值得拥有有正常生活的机会。他的女儿应当能够去上学。陈光诚有继续进行保护人权活动的权利。中国政府必须保证陈光诚和所有其他人权工作者可以在中国没有可能被逮捕或报复的恐惧进行他们的工作。要有光 要有诚!
